did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Historia de las misiones sonorenses y sus pueblos de visita, circa 1965
did.abstract: Brief histories of the missions and pueblos of Sonora during the time of Jesuit influence. Includes index to missions.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

did.langmaterial: Materials are in Spanish, with English translation.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is grouped by visita.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Brief histories of the missions and pueblos of Sonora during the time of Jesuit influence. Includes index to missions.

relatedmaterial.p: Photocopy; original in possession of author.
Related materials on topic and time period may be found in AZ 200.
